query: I need assistance in creating a 3-day travel itinerary for two people, starting from Denver and ending in Philadelphia. The trip will take place from March 18th to March 20th, 2022, and our budget is approximately $3,100. We are particularly interested in exploring both American and Mexican cuisines along the journey.
